E

edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg - package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg
A tool for writing all explained nodes in a Sabre search space to file.

G

getCharacter(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns the character associated with the given node.
getDistance(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns the minimum number of actions explained actions that can be taken from this node to reach a solution in the progression tree.
getEpistemicPath(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns the sequence of characters corresponding to a given node's theory of mind.
getNodes() - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns a collection of all explained node IDs in the progression tree.
getPlan(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns the sequence of actions that led to the state represented by a given node.
getState(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns an assignment of a value to every fluent defined in the progression tree's problem based on the state represented by a given node.
getUtility(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Returns the utility of the node's character in the state represented by the given node.

H

HELP_KEY - Static variable in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.Main
The command line key for the usage message

I

isSolution(long) - Method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Checks whether the plan leading to a given node is a solution, meaning that it improved the utility of a node's character via a sequence of explained actions.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.Main
Runs the Sabre Heuristic Data Generator tool based on the giving line arguments.
Main - Class in edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg
Runs a complete Sabre progression heuristic search based on the provided command line arguments and then writes relevant information for all explained nodes in the search's tree to file along with heuristic estimates for several of Sabre's heuristics.
Main() - Constructor for class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.Main

P

The command line key for the problem file URL
ProgressionTreeMap - Class in edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg
A wrapper around a progression tree which discovers all explained nodes in the tree and provides other methods for collecting data about those nodes.
ProgressionTreeMap(ProgressionTree, Worker.Status) - Constructor for class edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
Constructs a new progression tree wrapper and explores the tree to find all explained nodes.
